name: clickhouse
description: ClickHouse is an open-source columnar database management system for real-time analytics. Itâ€™s designed to handle petabytes of data with low latency and offers SQL compatibility, sharding, replication, and clustering options.
features: Columnar Database: Optimized for real-time analytics queries. Lightning fast.
Petabyte Scale: Handle massive datasets with low latency. Enterprise-grade.
SQL Compatible: Use familiar SQL syntax for queries. Easy adoption.
Sharding & Replication: Built-in clustering for high availability. Scalable architecture.
Real-Time Analytics: Process and analyze data in real-time. Instant insights.
Open Source: Transparent, community-driven development. No vendor lock-in.
Self-Hosted: Run your own analytics database. Complete control.
